message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't be serious with 50/50, I'm the one who's going to make the first move, so I'll give you a slightly lower amount this time!
You're trying to take the lead, but I'll give you a chance to reconsider. I'll offer you a slightly more generous split this time.
You're trying to be generous, but I'm not buying it. I'll take a slightly larger share this time, considering the inflation is eating away at our potential gains!
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not backing down. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
You're not budging, I'll take the lead. I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm not going to let you dictate the terms anymore!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm going to let you walk all over me!
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm not going to let you get away with a laughable 7.5% of the original amount. I'll take a slightly larger share this time, and you can try to do better next round!
You're getting bold, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm going to let you walk away with all the marbles!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking control now. I'll give you a tiny fraction, but it's better than nothing at this point!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm going to let you get away with everything!
It's now or never, Alice. I'll give you a token amount, but I'm taking the lion's share. You can't afford to reject this offer!
